LoginVideos.title: How to set (and reset) your SNHU single sign-on password
LoginVideos.description: When you receive the email with your single sign-on username, the first thing to do is to create your password by clicking the link to the SNHU password reset page.

LoginVideos.title: How to log in to mySNHU
LoginVideos.description: Once you're registered as a student at SNHU, you'll receive access to my.snhu.edu — often referred to as 'mySNHU.' Think of mySNHU as your virtual SNHU campus. Here you'll find links to the Brightspace learning platform, academic support and tutoring, and important information and contacts.

LoginVideos.title: How to log into the SNHU financial aid forms portal
LoginVideos.description: If SNHU is asked to obtain additional information to help determine your Federal Student Aid eligibility, our Student Financial Services team will send you an email inviting you to log in to the SNHU financial aid forms portal.

LoginVideos.title: How to log in to mySNHU — your virtual campus
LoginVideos.description: Here, you'll find links to the Brightspace learning platform, academic support and important information and contacts. It's smart to bookmark mySNHU on all your devices.

LoginVideos.title: How to log in to your SNHU webmail
LoginVideos.description: If you've been asked to access your webmail prior to registering for classes, you can do so by visiting SSO-MAIL.SNHU.EDU and entering your single sign-on username and password.

LoginVideos.title: How to log in to SNHU Brightspace learning platform
LoginVideos.description: The SNHU Brightspace learning platform is where you'll find, complete and submit your assignments. You'll also have access to free academic support and tutoring.

LoginVideos.title: How to preview your courses in Brightspace
LoginVideos.description: Brightspace is the learning platform where all your coursework happens — and it's available to you 24/7 wherever you have an internet connection.

CourseVideos.title: How do I buy my books?
CourseVideos.description: In most course, you're going to have need to purchase books, e-books or other courses. This video shows you how.

CourseVideos.title: Where Are My E-Books (Ask Abby!)
CourseVideos.description: In most course, you're going to have need to purchase books, e-books or other courses. This video shows you how.

CourseVideos.title: Special course materials and software
CourseVideos.description: In most course, you're going to have need to purchase books, e-books or other courses. This video shows you how.

PlanningVideos.title: Our #1 tip for success: Map out your week
PlanningVideos.description: Trust us. Mapping out your week help you to balance school, work and life.

PlanningVideos.title: What do I do during my first week at SNHU?
How much time should I spend in each course?
How to Get Good Grades at SNHU?
PlanningVideos.description: For every assignment you have, the rubric is a document that tells you what criteria your instructor will use to grade your work. The rubric is key to your success.

PlanningVideos.title: Five Techniques for Crushing Discussion Assignments
PlanningVideos.description: Most online courses at SNHU have discussion assignments as a big part of your grade. Here are 5 of our favorite tips for helping you max out the points you earn on your assignments.

PlanningVideos.title: How to preview your courses in Brightspace
PlanningVideos.description: Brightspace is the learning platform where all your coursework happens — and it's available to you 24/7 wherever you have an internet connection.

PlanningVideos.title: Complete your First Year Experience course
PlanningVideos.description: Students who take our free orientation course are more likely to succeed in their first term. Learn how to find, complete and submit assignments. This free, optional course does NOT affect your grade.

PlanningVideos.title: Protect your academic integrity (avoiding plagiarism and contract cheating)
PlanningVideos.description: At SNHU, academic integrity is crucial to both your reputation and ours. Here are four resources to make it easier for you to steer clear of academic integrity issues.

PlanningVideos.title: When should I reach out to my instructor?
Sync Brightspace to your personal calendar

TutoringVideos.title: Meet your SNHU coach, mentor and BFF
TutoringVideos.description: Your academic advisor will be your first contact for choosing courses, expanding your SNHU support network and helping you through daily ups and downs. Add them to your contacts!

TutoringVideos.title: SNHU career support starts on Day One
TutoringVideos.description: Our career services team will work with you to identify and work toward your career goals. Make an appointment with them during your first term.

TutoringVideos.title: Be smart — make use of free 24/7 tutoring
TutoringVideos.description: Whether it's for math, statistics, writing or any other subject, our SNHU academic support team LOVES to help people with their homework.

TutoringVideos.title: Take advantage of FREE mental health counseling and wellness resources
TutoringVideos.description: We created the SNHU HelpU program to provide students with free, confidential, in-the-moment support to help manage life's challenges while in college.
TutoringVideos.buttonTitle: Go to Health and Wellness Resources

TuitionVideos.title: Your own personal college finance counselor
TuitionVideos.description: When you connect with an SNHU student finance counselor, you'll have someone who will get to know your specific situation and help you find ways to make college as affordable as possible.

TuitionVideos.title: How to review and understand your financial aid offer
TuitionVideos.description: Before reviewing your financial aid offer, please watch the video.
TuitionVideos.buttonTitle: More Tips for Reviewing Financial Aid Offer

TuitionVideos.title: What is the Free Application for Federal Student Aid (FAFSA)?
TuitionVideos.description: If you'll be paying for your college education, there's a good chance you've heard someone mention the FAFSA. But exactly what is it, and how can it help you pay for your education? This video is a great introduction.

HypeVideos.title: SNHU was with me every step of the way
HypeVideos.description: Since 1932, SNHU's mission has been to expand access to high-quality, affordable education. Hear from some of our many first-generation college graduates about the power of earning a degree from SNHU.

HypeVideos.title: We love our first-generation college students!
HypeVideos.description: Since 1932, SNHU's mission has been to expand access to high-quality, affordable education. Hear from some of our many first-generation college graduates about the power of earning a degree from SNHU.

HypeVideos.title: Save money with these discounts for SNHU students
HypeVideos.description: From free Microsoft 365 software to discounts on clothing, travel, events and online music, here are some of our favorite discounts available to SNHU students.
